scripts.version:patch: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const v=require('./version.json');const [major,minor,patch]=v.version.split('.');v.version=`${major}.${minor}.${parseInt(patch)+1}`;fs.writeFileSync('./version.json',JSON.stringify(v,null,2));" && npm run update-version
scripts.version:minor: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const v=require('./version.json');const [major,minor]=v.version.split('.');v.version=`${major}.${parseInt(minor)+1}.0`;fs.writeFileSync('./version.json',JSON.stringify(v,null,2));" && npm run update-version
scripts.version:major: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const v=require('./version.json');const [major]=v.version.split('.');v.version=`${parseInt(major)+1}.0.0`;fs.writeFileSync('./version.json',JSON.stringify(v,null,2));" && npm run update-version
scripts.build: npm run update-version && cd src/frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
